item.title: Up and Running with R + RStudio
item.description: Letâ€™s dive right in! This post will get new users of R up and running quickly. Getting Started If youâ€™ve never used R before, then you are in for a treat! The awesome people at RStudio are doing incredible work to help users of R be productive. RStudio is an open source (+commercial editions) Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

item.title: Using str_glue() in R for Advanced Plotting
item.description: Letâ€™s Dive Into an Example Iâ€™d like to share a technique using str_glue() that I learned from Matt Dancho, a Data-Science instructor at Business Science University. Check out my favorite course here: Business Analysis With R. str_glue() from the stringr library is one of my favorite functions in R - Itâ€™s super helpful for wrangling and manipulating text in preparation for building plots.
